products.title: Splash Snow White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Snow White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Splash Snow is a beautiful fresh white colour, it will work perfectly in most spaces. A real all rounder & great for brightening up any room.  Splash Snow fabric is moisture resistant making it a wonderful choice for kitchens or high traffic areas. Panel blinds are our best choice for big windows and our go-to recommendation for french windows and patio doors.
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0263 Fabric Colour: Snow Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Paper White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Paper White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash Paper White Panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space.  This off-white dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space.  Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe.  As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with our 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.  
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This white panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service. Still not sure? Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0280 Fabric Colour: Paper Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Frost White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Frost White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £36.61 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A highly popular range, loved by our customers for its simplicity and value for money, our Splash fabrics come in a wide range of colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. This White panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and white fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. 
 
One of the largest blinds we make, our panel blinds stretch to a massive five metres width and three and a half metres drop.  This makes panel blinds perfect for covering large windows that stretch the property, or conservatory windows and patio doors.  Another great alternative, is to use panel blinds as room divider, a unique and stylish way to divide space.  
 
Our panel blinds are value for money and easy to install. For ease of mind, all our products come with a 5 year guarantee, made in the heart of the Yorkshire textile homeland, Swift Direct Blinds upholds high quality products at highly-competitive online prices. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0242 Fabric Colour: Frost Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.productdescription:
Available in a range of sunny colours suitable for all rooms including kitchens and bathrooms. Genesis is also available in our roller and vertical ranges. 
 This white panel blind is great for any room to tie white into your colour scheme or follow an exisiting one. The blind can also be used as a room divider - handy!

products.title: Voile FR LL Brilliant White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR LL Brilliant White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £39.38 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Flame Retardant Voile range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This brilliant white panel blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice.  
 
Our Voile Brilliant White panel is also allergy resistant which means it is the best choice for bedrooms and kitchens. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, panelblinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this panel blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds. 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0201 Fabric Colour: Brilliant White Material: 100% Polyester     Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Mood FR Voile Cotton White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Mood FR Voile Cotton White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £39.38 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Mood Voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood Fr Voile Cotton White is a semi-translucent stylish, light white panel blind and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern white shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame Retardant coating makes this sheer panel blind a fantastic addition to your living space. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, panel blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this white panel blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds.
 
  Product ID: DB-PAN0282 Fabric Colour: Cotton White Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type:  Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER1 - Lowest Energy Saving Value - Due to Blind Type or Fabric Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Chatsworth White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A modern patterned translucent fabric in 3 colour ways. You will also find this design in our vertical and roller blind collections. 
 
This crisp white patterned panel blind will freshen up any room and can be used as a room divider.

products.title: Bella Blackout Paper White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Paper White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This Paper White panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This off-white panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!  
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0281 Fabric Colour: Paper White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Drill-Free Slimline Frame with Sleek Roller Casing     Control Type: Cordless Spring Operated Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Bella Blackout Frost White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Frost White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics are simplistic, value for money and come in a wide array of choices.  Bella Blackout Frost White is perfect for large windows or spaces, as they reach up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop.  
 
 
Our panel blinds are cut to your sizes by our expert panel blind team.  At Swift Direct Blinds we are so confident of the quality of our products, we provide a FREE five year guarantee. 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-PAN0225 Fabric Colour: Frost Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Eco Friendly FR White Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Eco Friendly FR White Panel Blind in White. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Eco-Friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! 
 
Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  White doesnt have to mean stark. This white panel  blind creates a fresh and smart finish, meaning you have a perfect base to accessorise the room as muh as you want! Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind!
  
 Product ID: DB-PAN0304 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Recycled Polyester Headrail: White Aluminium 5 channel track     Control Type: Cord or Wand Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Frost
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Splash Frost Standard Panel Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Standard Panel Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Min Width: 600mm Max Width: 5000mm
 	Min Drop: 450mm Max Drop: 3500mm
 	Composition: Polyester
 	Guarantee: 12 Months
 	Stack: A choice of left, right or split.
 	Controls: Wand control attached to lead panel(s) to manually pull panels across.
 	Headrail: Robust white aluminium track, track depth varies depending on number of panels required.
 	Fixings: Top fix or face fix brackets.
